content: **this pattern is available for free on my site ** **difficulty ** easy **materials needed ** 4mm g hook or hook needed to obtain gauge - band 5mm h hook or hook needed to obtain gauge - hat body 250-260 yards red heart soft in seafoam or 250 yards red heart unforgettable in sunrise 1/4 yd fashion faux fur fabric - ivory gold metallic heavy-duty button thread sharp heavy duty sewing needle golf-ball sized piece of polyester stuffing large pom-pom maker optional **stitches used ** chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet fpdc = front post double_crochet **additional terms ** 3-double_crochet cluster= dc3tog worked in same st half_double_crochet in the 3rd loop = look at the top of the stitch and locate the sideways v bend the stitch to look at the back* and you should see another v you ll be working into the back loop of that v this is called the 3rd loop *for this hat band the textured portion created by working half_double_crochet in the 3rd loop should always be facing you when beginning a new row when working on the hat body the 3rd loop will be facing away from you **gauge ** with red heart soft 15 half_double_crochet in 4 with unforgettable 16 half_double_crochet in 4 **measurements ** with red heart soft 10 3/4 at widest point x 10 1/2 tall excluding pom-pom with unforgettable 10 1/2 at widest point x 9 1/2 tall **additional notes ** chain-1 at beginning of a row does not count as a stitch chain-2 at beginning of row does count as a stitch
